name: Get Lighthouse, Inc.
description: Developer of an employee relationship management platform designed to develop managerial and soft skills. The company's platform features a multi-angle approach by using educational marketing, psychology research, sound work and behavioral economics to measure strengths and weaknesses and improve skills, enabling managers and top-level executives to motivate, have one-on-one sessions and develop strong relationships with their employees and prevent turnover in the process.
